A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed in the direction Rian Johnson has taken. What was the point of ANYTHING that happened in TFA now? \n\nVisually\, it is an amazing film\, and as a stand alone film with no backstory\, it is great.  But as an entry into one of the most hallowed sci-fi franchises ever\, it felt like a giant middle finger to everything that had come before it.
